meanings.definition: A sticky substance used to adhere objects together.
meanings.sent1: I used stickums to attach the paper to the wall.
meanings.sent2: The stickums on the back of the photo kept it in place.
meanings.sent3: The stickums were so strong, they even stuck to my fingers!
meanings.sent4: Her love was like stickums, holding us together through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The stickums left a residue when I removed them, reminding me of their strength.

meanings.definition: A slang term for adhesive stickers or labels.
meanings.sent1: She decorated her laptop with colorful stickums.
meanings.sent2: The kids loved collecting stickums from their favorite brands.
meanings.sent3: I found a stickum stuck to the bottom of my shoe!
meanings.sent4: The stickums on the package made it look more festive.
meanings.sent5: The stickums on the map helped us mark our route clearly.
